title.narrative: Strengthen Integrated Delivery of HIV/AIDS Services (SIDHAS)

description.narrative: (Nigeria): -The SIDHAS activity will provide quality TB and HIV/AIDS services and build the capacity of the public and private sectors in Nigeria to ensure sustainability.-SIDHAS will build on USAID TBHIV investments in three of the six priority states to expand facility and community based DOTS and DR TB services to unreached populations. The activity will engage professional bodies, faith-based organizations, labor unions, patent medicine vendors, community pharmacists, and civil society organizations in TB control interventions.-Mobile TB services will be piloted to reach underserved populations. Advocacy to policy makers and social mobilization interventions for TB identification and control will be implemented in these three states.-These interventions will improve subnational government engagement in TB control, increase TB cases detected, and increase public awareness and community involvement in TB control.
